title: The Wynns, winegrowers
brief_description: Traces the growth of the Wynn’s family wind business over 50 years. From small beginnings they now own large vineyards in various parts of Australia. Illustrates the organisation of the entire industry from growing the grapes to marketing bottled table wines, champagne and flagons.
